xmlquery.searchConditionByIdSite: Select a.idCondition as idCondition, a.idSite as idSite, a.idDevice as idDevice, a.operand as operand, a.value as value, a.idValueType as idValueType, b.nmValueType as nmValueType from smiot_condition a inner join smiot_value_type b on a.idValueType=b.idValueType where a.idSite = ?
xmlquery.searchConditionByAnyLike: Select a.idCondition as idCondition, a.idSite as idSite, a.idDevice as idDevice, a.operand as operand, a.value as value, a.idValueType as idValueType, b.nmValueType as nmValueType from smiot_condition a inner join smiot_value_type b on a.idValueType=b.idValueType where a.idSite = ? and (a.idCondition like ? or a.idSite like ? or a.idDevice like ? or a.operand like ? or a.value like ? or a.idValueType like ?)
xmlquery.conditionDelete: Delete from smiot_condition where idCondition = ? and idSite=? and idDevice=?
xmlquery.conditionEdit: Update smiot_condition set idCondition=?,idSite=?,idDevice=?,operand=?,value=?,idValueType=? where idCondition=? and idSite=? and idDevice=?
